GSD.product_version: versions from v3.4 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
pstore: Avoid kcore oops by vmap()ing with VM_IOREMAP

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 295f59cd2cdeed841850d02dddde3a122cbf6fc6, it was introduced in version v3.4 by commit 404a6043385de17273624b076599669db5ad891f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: pstore: Avoid kcore oops by vmap()ing with VM_IOREMAP
